entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Paulatuk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:49 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -18.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Paulatuk Airport 06:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023
Temperature: -18.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -33
Dewpoint: -21.0°C
Wind: SSE 52 km/h gust 83 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Blizzard. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending this morning then snow and blowing snow. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind south 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 this morning then becoming southwest 20 this afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow this evening and after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming west 40 gusting to 60 this evening then southwest 20 overnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023
